sentences.en: Bottling up your anger can only lead to unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 把怒气憋在肚子里只会道致痛苦.

sentences.en: He could not bear to lay too much responsibility for the unhappiness of his later years on his own shoulders.
sentences.cn: 为自己晚景凄凉承担这么多责任，他接受不了。

sentences.en: He expressed his unhappiness about the arrangements.
sentences.cn: 他表达了对这些安排的不满.

sentences.en: He had sensed his mother's unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到了母亲的不悦。

sentences.en: He has seen much unhappiness in his life.
sentences.cn: 他一生经历了许多不幸.

sentences.en: His laugh-a-minute image is just a front to hide his deep unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 他滑稽可笑的形象只是用来掩饰内心深处痛苦的假面具。
他不高兴是可以理解的。

sentences.en: It's easy to be concerned with problems across the other side of the world and not see the poverty and unhappiness on your own doorstep.
sentences.cn: 人们往往会关注世界另一端的问题,而忽略了家门口的贫困和不幸.

sentences.en: She divorced him after years of unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 经过多年的不愉快,她跟他离婚了.

sentences.en: The best cure for unhappiness is to hurl yourself into your work.
sentences.cn: 医治愁苦的最好办法就是全身心地投入工作.

sentences.en: The quarrel caused her intense unhappiness.
There is no need to think that you are sentenced to a lifetime of unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 没必要认为你就注定一辈子得不到幸福.

sentences.en: There was a lot of unhappiness in my adolescence.
sentences.cn: 年少时我经历过很多不愉快。

sentences.en: Unhappiness had deadened her to the lives of others.
sentences.cn: 她遭遇不幸,因而对别人的生活也无动于衷.

sentences.en: Unhappiness is the root cause of his illness.
sentences.cn: 不开心是他生病的根源.
